description: Holds the discharge delays on a patient.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: DD_DELAY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Discharge delay


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Patient refusing to leave


Clinical state deteriorating


Waiting on specialist consultation


Waiting on lab result


Waiting on destination approval


Administering IV medications


Patient's ride delayed


Need physician signoff

columns.name: DD_RESOLVED_AT_DTTM
columns.description: When the discharge delay was added

columns.name: DD_COMMENT
columns.description: Holds the comment entered by users on a delay

columns.name: DD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds the current status of a delay 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Resolved


Discontinued

columns.name: DD_IS_PRIMARY_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the delay is primary. Y indicates that the delay is primary. A null value indicates that the delay is not primary. An N will not be populated for this column. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
